task.title: Replace Damaged Potentiometer
task.shortdesc: Install a new potentiometer to replace one with a damaged carbon track that prevents proper signal control.

context.p: If other troubleshooting steps have not resolved the problem, the potentiometer's carbon track may be damaged. Replace the faulty potentiometer to restore proper volume or tone control.

step.cmd: Solder all connections to the new potentiometer.

result.p: The new potentiometer now controls volume or tone properly.
